    5 Things I've Learned Since The Course Started

  • I've learned how to create a basic webpage using HTML.
  • I've learned how to style a webpage using CSS.
  • I've learned how to create font kits and import them into HTML and CSS.
  • I've learned how to create lists in html.
  • I've learned how to place elements on webpages with padding, margin, and float.
